Articles.Content: Hi! I've been playing KSP For a while now but just joined the forums. Landed on the mun, Trying to learn how to setup a kethane mining operation, I may start mining on kerban or kerbin i keep forgetting remind me please. Mining kethane on the home planet would be an easy start! Jebediah Kerman is my favorite kerbalnaught!
Welcome to the forums, Cadet! If you ever need some tips, let us know! We'd be happy to help..

Welcome to the forums, Cadet! If you ever need some tips, let us know! We'd be happy to help..

Thanks!

I'm having a great time on the forums already >.>
